name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and melted cheese on a thin crust.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description: Pizza topped with a blend of four cheeses, such as mozzarella, parmesan, fontina, and gorgonzola.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Spaghetti pasta served with a rich and savory Bolognese sauce made with ground meat, tomatoes, and herbs.

name: Penne Arrabiata
description: Penne pasta served with a spicy tomato sauce seasoned with garlic, red chili peppers, and olive oil.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Fettuccine pasta served with a creamy Alfredo sauce made with butter, cream, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Cannoli
description: Traditional Italian pastry dessert tube filled with sweet, creamy ricotta cheese and chocolate chips.

name: Gelato
description: Italian frozen dessert similar to ice cream but with a denser and creamier texture.

name: Salmon Sushi Roll
description: Sushi roll filled with fresh salmon, rice, and vegetables, wrapped in seaweed.

name: Tuna Sushi Roll
description: Sushi roll filled with fresh tuna, rice, and vegetables, wrapped in seaweed.

name: California Roll
description: Popular sushi roll made with imitation crab, avocado, cucumber, and rice, wrapped in seaweed.

name: Shrimp Tempura
description: Shrimp coated in tempura batter and deep-fried until crispy, served with dipping sauce.

name: Vegetable Tempura
description: Assorted vegetables (such as sweet potato, bell pepper, and broccoli) coated in tempura batter and deep-fried.

name: Chicken Karaage
description: Japanese-style fried chicken marinated in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger, then coated in flour and deep-fried.

name: Tonkotsu Ramen
description: Ramen noodles served in a rich and creamy pork bone broth, topped with slices of pork, green onions, and egg.

name: Miso Ramen
description: Ramen noodles served in a savory miso broth, topped with slices of pork, green onions, and bean sprouts.

name: Shoyu Ramen
description: Ramen noodles served in a clear soy sauce-based broth, topped with slices of pork, bamboo shoots, and nori seaweed.

name: Matcha Ice Cream
description: Green tea-flavored ice cream made from matcha powder, milk, and sugar.

name: Red Bean Ice Cream
description: Creamy ice cream flavored with sweet red bean paste, a popular dessert in Japan.

name: Sesame Seed Ice Cream
description: Rich and nutty ice cream flavored with toasted sesame seeds.

name: Chicken Tacos
description: Soft or crispy taco shells filled with seasoned shredded chicken, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa, served in soft or crispy taco shells.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Tacos filled with fried or grilled fish (such as tilapia or cod), cabbage slaw, and creamy sauce, served in soft corn tortillas.

name: Beef Burrito
description: Large flour tortilla filled with seasoned ground beef, rice, beans, cheese, and salsa, rolled up and grilled until crispy.

name: Chicken Burrito
description: Large flour tortilla filled with seasoned shredded chicken, rice, beans, cheese, and salsa, rolled up and grilled until crispy.

name: Vegetarian Burrito
description: Large flour tortilla filled with rice, beans, cheese, vegetables (such as bell peppers and onions), and salsa, rolled up and grilled until crispy.

name: Guacamole
description: Creamy avocado dip made with mashed avocados, lime juice, onions, tomatoes, and cilantro.

name: Salsa Verde
description: Green salsa made with tomatillos, green chilies, onions, cilantro, and lime juice, with a tangy and slightly spicy flavor.

name: Pico de Gallo
description: Fresh salsa made with diced tomatoes, onions, jalapenos, cilantro, and lime juice, served as a topping or dip.

name: Churros
description: Deep-fried dough pastry sprinkled with cinnamon sugar, often served with chocolate or caramel dipping sauce.

name: Flan
description: Creamy caramel custard dessert with a smooth texture and rich flavor, topped with caramel sauce.

name: Tres Leches Cake
description: Moist sponge cake soaked in a mixture of three milks (evaporated milk, condensed milk, and heavy cream), topped with whipped cream and fresh fruit.
